item.description:
Let's shop for Fruits and Vegetables at Boston Haymarket - around Union and Blackstone Streets (north of Faneuil Hall and south of Orange and Green Line Haymarket Stops). Produce prices are very good and it's a great low-key gathering place! Please note that some vendors begin packing up a half hour or more early in order to leave as their 'rush business' slows which prompts them to drop their prices around 4:30pm on Fridays and 5:00pm on Saturdays. http://maps.google.com/maps?q=77+Union+St.,+Boston,+MA+02108

This is a "cross-post" event with Boston Vegan Meetup and Boston Vegetarian Meetup where it occurs each Friday and Saturday and a "non-host" event which means that you will be on your own to browse the farmers' market at your own pace. Do not expect for an Organizer to be there from any Meetup group to greet you. Shop any vendors you like and leave whenever you are ready.
item.name: Shop at Haymarket 1st.Sat./mo. @5pm
